A Haunting Memory

<setup: a serene cottage, flowers everywhere, somber mood>
<optional narration: A tragic scene unfolds.>
Svidrigaïlov: *This beauty hides such sorrow…*

<setup: a drawing-room, a coffin draped in white>
<optional narration: Silence fills the air.>
Svidrigaïlov: *She was so young…*

<setup: a girl in a white dress, flowers around her>
<optional narration: A heartbroken spirit.>
Svidrigaïlov: *Crushed by the world’s cruelty.*

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov discovers a coffin in a beautifully adorned room, revealing the tragic fate of a young girl who drowned herself in despair.
